name: Hey! Don't Touch My Jets!
description:
"Hey! Don't Touch My Jets!" is an entry for Scorespace's Speedjam #1. After a bioweapon left you as the sole survivor of your military base, you'll have to use the various defense systems to prevent enemy forces from looting the base and destroying your air traffic control tower. The goal is to minimize the number of stolen jets while staying alive for ten waves.

The only assets made outisde of the gamejam window are the dirt background, explosion effect, and font.
